Description: On I-66 at mile marker 41.8 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 166.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect delays due to congestion. Traffic backups are approximately 3.5 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Congestion/Delay

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 270 in the County of Shenandoah, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On US-29 in the County of Nelson, in the vicinity of Lewis Ln; Rt. 775E/W (Nelson County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
